Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet high standards and deliver exceptional value. Given its quality and features, I believe it's worth more than $150 to you. Considering the unique benefits it provides, I'm offering it to you for $200. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the time and effort put into ensuring its excellence. I'm confident this investment will pay off in terms of convenience, efficiency, and satisfaction. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
